name: Magical Shooter
description:
~~~Work In Progress~~~

A cute FPS where you fight a bunch of ghosties. You have to manage the tug-of-war battle between the light and dark energy that powers your weapons. You have a rapid fire light magic shot and a dark magic spread shot. Using your light magic makes your dark magic stronger and your light magic weaker, and vice versa. Juggle this with running around collecting power-ups and dodging attacks. 

Art and UI are placeholder. Any feedback on difficulty, fun, or bugs would be appreciated.
